00084 //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00085 void BdkPdfProdAll::init(const char * theName,
00086                          const char * theDesc,
00087                          RooRealVar& deltaE,
00088                          RooRealVar& mD,        
00089                          RooRealVar& mes,       
00090                          RooRealVar& nnCont,    
00091                          RooRealVar& nnComb,    
00092                          BdkPdfAbsBase* nnContPdf,
00093                          BdkPdfAbsBase* nnCombPdf,
00094                          BdkPdfAbsBase* dalitzPdf) {
00095 
00096   // Do base class initializer
00097   baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00098 
00099   // common initialization:
00100   commonInit();
00101 
00102   // set the dependents of the owned objects:
00103   _ownedDeltaEPdf.setDependent(deltaE);
00104   _ownedMDPdf.setDependent(mD);
00105   _ownedMesPdf.setDependent(mes);
00106   _ownedNnContPdf.setDependent(nnCont);
00107   _ownedNnCombPdf.setDependent(nnComb);
00108 
00109   // if external PDFs are supplied use them
00110   if (nnContPdf) _nnContPdf = nnContPdf;
00111   if (nnCombPdf) _nnCombPdf = nnCombPdf;
00112 
00113   // Set the external pointer PDFs;
00114   _dalitzPdf = dalitzPdf;
00115 
00116   initParameters();
00117 }
00118 
00119 //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00120 void BdkPdfProdAll::init(const char * theName,
00121                          const char * theDesc,
00122                          BdkPdfAbsBase* deltaEPdf,
00123                          BdkPdfAbsBase* mDPdf,
00124                          BdkPdfAbsBase* mesPdf,
00125                          BdkPdfAbsBase* nnContPdf,
00126                          BdkPdfAbsBase* nnCombPdf,
00127                          BdkPdfAbsBase* dalitzPdf) {
00128   // Do base class initializer
00129   baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00130 
00131   // common initialization:
00132   commonInit();
00133 
00134   _deltaEPdf = deltaEPdf;
00135   _mDPdf = mDPdf;
00136   _mesPdf = mesPdf;
00137   _nnContPdf = nnContPdf;
00138   _nnCombPdf = nnCombPdf;
00139   _dalitzPdf = dalitzPdf;
00140 }

00142 //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00143 void BdkPdfProdAll::initParameters() {
00144   // Initialize the owned PDFs and set the units of their parameters:  
00145   // deltae:
00146   _ownedDeltaEPdf.init(TString(GetName()) + ".deltaEPdf",
00147                        TString(GetTitle()) + ".deltaEPdf OWNED",
00148                        *_ownedDeltaEPdf.dependent(),0, 2);
00149 
00150   _ownedDeltaEPdf.gauss().b()->setVal(0.0);
00151   _ownedDeltaEPdf.gauss().s()->setVal(0.019);
00152   
00153   // mD:
00154   _ownedMDPdf.init(TString(GetName()) + ".mDPdf",
00155                    TString(GetTitle()) + ".mDPdf OWNED",
00156                    *_ownedMDPdf.dependent(),0, 2);   
00157 
00158   // mes:
00159   _ownedMesPdf.init(TString(GetName()) + ".mesPdf",
00160                    TString(GetTitle()) + ".mesPdf OWNED",
00161                    *_ownedMesPdf.dependent());   
00162 
00163   // nnCont:
00164   _ownedNnContPdf.init(TString(GetName()) + ".nnContPdf",
00165                        TString(GetTitle()) + ".nnContPdf OWNED",
00166                        *_ownedNnContPdf.dependent());  
00167 
00168   // nnComb:
00169   _ownedNnCombPdf.init(TString(GetName()) + ".nnCombPdf",
00170                        TString(GetTitle()) + ".nnCombPdf OWNED",
00171                        *_ownedNnCombPdf.dependent());  
00172 
00173 
00174 }
00175 
00176 //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00177 void BdkPdfProdAll::commonInit() {
00178   // initialize external pointers:
00179   _dalitzPdf = 0;
00180   _nnContPdf = 0;
00181   _nnCombPdf = 0;
00182   _mDPdf = 0;
00183   _mesPdf = 0;
00184 
00185   // initialize these PDFs to the owned ones:
00186   useOwnedDeltaEPdf();
00187   useOwnedMDPdf();
00188   useOwnedMesPdf();
00189   useOwnedNnContPdf();
00190   useOwnedNnCombPdf();
00191 
00192   // by default, include all variablesin the product PDF:
00193   _includeDeltaE = kTRUE;
00194   _includeMD = kTRUE;
00195   _includeMes = kTRUE;
00196   _includeDalitz = kTRUE;
00197   _includeNnCont = kTRUE;
00198   _includeNnComb = kTRUE;
00199 
00200 }

00205   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00206 }

00238 //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00239 void BdkPdfProdAll::createPdf() {
00240   // Add the components of this PDF:
00241   removeComponents();
00242   if (_includeDeltaE && 0 != getDeltaEPdf()) addComponent(getDeltaEPdf());
00243   if (_includeDalitz && 0 != getDalitzPdf()) addComponent(getDalitzPdf());
00244   if (_includeNnCont && 0 != getNnContPdf()) addComponent(getNnContPdf());
00245   if (_includeNnComb && 0 != getNnCombPdf()) addComponent(getNnCombPdf());
00246   if (_includeMD &&     0 != getMDPdf())     addComponent(getMDPdf());
00247   if (_includeMes &&    0 != getMesPdf())    addComponent(getMesPdf());
00248 
00249   // Makes both PDFs of this wrapper
00250   RooAbsPdf * thePdf = new RooProdPdf(GetName() + TString(".pdf"),
00251                                       GetTitle() + TString("PDF"),
00252                                       componentPdfs());
00253 
00254   setPdf(*thePdf, kTRUE);   // owned
00255 
00256   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00257 }
00258 
00259 //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00260 BdkPdfAbsBase * BdkPdfProdAll::getVarPdf(BdkPdfProdAll::Var var) {
00261   switch(var) {
00262   case DELTAE: return getDeltaEPdf();
00263   case MD: return getMDPdf();
00264   case MES: return getMesPdf();
00265   case DALITZ: return getDalitzPdf();
00266   case NNCONT: return getNnContPdf();
00267   case NNCOMB: return getNnCombPdf();
00268   }
00269   return 0;
00270 }
00271 
00272 //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00273 Bool_t BdkPdfProdAll::deltaEPdfIsOwned() const {
00274   Bool_t result = kFALSE;
00275   if((BdkPdfAbsBase *)(&_ownedDeltaEPdf) == _deltaEPdf) {
00276         result = kTRUE;
00277   }
00278   return result;
00279 }

00354 //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00355 void BdkPdfProdAll::printVariables() {
00356   cout << "(";
00357   if (_includeDeltaE) cout << "DeltaE";
00358   if (_includeMD) cout << ", MD";
00359   if (_includeMes) cout << ", Mes";
00360   if (_includeDalitz) cout << ", Dalitz";
00361   if (_includeNnCont) cout << ", NnCont";
00362   if (_includeNnComb) cout << ", NnComb";
00363 
00364   cout << ")" << endl;
00365 }
